column2: There has been a significant loosening of enforcement for copyright violations for individuals and certain organizations, in a move cheered by anti-copyright proponents and digital pirates alike.
There has been a recent loosening of enforcement for copyright violations for individuals, particularly for small offenses. Major publishers dismayed.
There has been a recent crackdown on copyright law violations by individuals. Publishers cheer, although anti-copyright proponents are dismayed.

There has been a significant crackdown against copyright violations by individuals and organizations. Although widely applauded by publishers, critics complain of severe restrictions for seemingly legal content.
